content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Clean & straghtforward! Great for CoC! 
(Maybe you can define the vowels as constants or in bold ?)

Constraints
* Please change 100000 to 100. It's impossible to have a string of length 100000 as input because that exceeds CodinGame's maximum limit. Also, the current upper bound doesn't reflect the actual cases.

* Please add "and at least one non-vowel character" after "characters".

Stub generator
* Please change 100000 to 100.

Cases
* Validator 1: Please revise the case such that it is similar to, but not identical to, Test 1. [[S]] should still have an odd length.

* Validator 3: Please update the input to have an odd length, similar to Test 3.

* Test 4: Please update the input to have an even length, similar to Validator 4.

* Please add a new pair of cases where all 26 letters, both uppercase and lowercase, and other characters appear in [[S]]. The length of [[S]] should be odd, with the letters arranged in random order.

* Please add a new pair of cases where all 26 letters, both uppercase and lowercase, and other characters appear in [[S]]. The length of [[S]] should be even, with the letters arranged in random order.

Thanks.

Thank you for the updates. The cases still need some tweaks:

* Validator 5: Please remove the trailing newline from the output.

* The characters u, A, I and O appear in validators only, but not in tests. Consider modifying the cases as follows to include the characters:

  • Test 3: change "o" to "O".

  • Test 4: change "a" to "A".

  • Test 5: change "i" and "U" to "I" and "u".

Thanks again.
Done. Thanks again for the suggestions.
